A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Waste of talent\, bad plot - plot holes everywhere\, bad directing\, no progressive character build ups\, it can't be certified fresh\, any big fan will know it isn't right a huge disrespect to major characters\, it did have it's moments but film just had too many problems. They had Gollum one of the greatest talent and didn't utilise him well -  imagine his skills with a light sabre! No light sabre fights with major characters =( No exciting storm trooper combat fights/battles. Same goes for many other characters but could be writing for hours. They have to pull some miracle to save the next episode.
